channel.title: Comments on: Torchwood is back!
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: ljedi
item.dc:creator: ljedi
item.description: EDIT: OK, where the heck did you find a healthy torrent/download that doesn't require registration??
item.content:encoded: EDIT: OK, where the heck did you find a healthy torrent/download that doesn’t require registration??

item.title: By: ljedi
item.dc:creator: ljedi
item.description:
I LOVE Torchwood!! I think Captain Jack did some better acting when he was on Dr. Who, but I love the show anyway. I'm so happy to know that Season 2 is out! Now I must go find it...
Veronica Mars is great, too -- John hooked me on it. The witty repartee is just amazing.
item.content:encoded:
I LOVE Torchwood!! I think Captain Jack did some better acting when he was on Dr. Who, but I love the show anyway. I’m so happy to know that Season 2 is out! Now I must go find it…

Veronica Mars is great, too — John hooked me on it. The witty repartee is just amazing.
